plugin.author: Eddie MacDonald
plugin.description: A visual tuner knob control for SDR#. Great for touch screens and tablets.

plugin.author: Eddie MacDonald
plugin.description: Adds simple UI options to SDR#, including the ability to make the interface black in color, remove excess padding to save screen space and to move the top frequency toolbar to the bottom of the screen.

plugin.author: Eddie MacDonald
plugin.description: Allows you to take easy screenshots of the FFT and waterfall spectrums.

plugin.author: Eddie MacDonald
plugin.description: Puts some useful SDR# controls right on the SDR# toolbar, making them easier to access
